rules.description: Change fn + letter to hyper + letter

manipulators.description: Change hyper+w to F13 (to avoid system binding of hyper-w which creates 500mb wifi diagnostics file in /var/tmp)
Change fn+w to F13 (to avoid system binding of hyper-w which creates 500mb wifi diagnostics file in /var/tmp)
Change fn + delete to hyper + delete
Change fn + left to hyper + left
Change fn + down to hyper + down
Change fn + right to hyper + right
Change fn + up to hyper + up
Change fn + s to hyper + s
Change fn + e to hyper + e
Change fn + c to hyper + c
Change fn + i to hyper + i
Change fn + k to hyper + k
Change fn + p to hyper + p
Change fn + f to hyper + f
Change fn + m to hyper + m
Change fn + v to hyper + v
Change fn + t to hyper + t
Change fn + n to hyper + n
Change fn + a to hyper + a
Change fn + b to hyper + b
Change fn + r to hyper + r
Change fn + q to hyper + q
Change fn + y to hyper + y
Change fn + u to hyper + u
Change fn + o to hyper + o
Change fn + d to hyper + d
Change fn + g to hyper + g
Change fn + h to hyper + h
Change fn + j to hyper + j
Change fn + l to hyper + l
Change fn + z to hyper + z
Change fn + x to hyper + x

rules.description: Change spacebar to left_shift. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
